text: @GovAbbott This is sound advice from the G.O.A.T. If you aren't going to do it for yourself, do it for your neighbor or for an immunodeficient relative. The truth of our situation is that we cannot shutdown again, so it is up to each of us to limit the spread of COVID-19 as much as possible
